Which nationalities cry most, and least, when they win the Olympics?
item.description:
Ethan Mollick on Twitter

‚ÄúEveryone cries more than Europeans & Africans when they win at the Olympics. This paper examines cross-cultural emotion when athletes win ü•á. No difference between rich & poorer countries but men do cry more in countries with more female labor equality. https://t.co/jUBmICg8Gk‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/emollick/status/1597647656997642240

source: Thursday assorted links
